QuestData.Title: Fortunate Souls
QuestData.Description:
You and I survived the attack and have thus far evaded capture by the enemy.
Not all were as fortunate.
There are many of our allies now under the control of the naga. We must free them before they are killed or suffer an even worse fate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue $1oa captive soldiers in Spears of Azshara.
